title: Realistic Portrait Generator
description:
# Realistic Portrait Generator

A **high-quality** portrait generation model with excellent facial detail rendering.

## Features

- High resolution output
- Multiple art styles
- Real-time generation

### Usage

```python
from portrait_gen import PortraitGenerator
model = PortraitGenerator()
result = model.generate(prompt="realistic portrait")
```

For more information, visit [our documentation](https://example.com/docs).
description_html:
Realistic Portrait Generator

Features

For more information, visit our documentation.

comments.comment:
**Amazing results!** This model produces incredibly realistic portraits.

### What I loved:
- High detail rendering
- Fast generation times
- Multiple style options

`Highly recommended for professional use!`

title: Text Summarizer Pro
description:
## Text Summarizer Pro

Advanced natural language processing model for intelligent text summarization.

### Key Benefits

1. **Fast processing** - Summarizes documents in seconds
2. **High accuracy** - Maintains context and key information
3. **Multi-format support** - Works with various document types

> "This is the best summarization model I've used!" - *Happy User*

#### Technical Specifications

- Model size: 1.2B parameters
- Input limit: 10,000 tokens
- Languages: 50+

```bash
pip install text-summarizer-pro
```
